task.title: Manage Instances
task.shortdesc: This screen allows you to view a list of your instances, create new instances, and connect to, reboot, stop, terminate, and delete instances. You can page through the list of instances by clicking the navigation buttons at the bottom of the screen.

step.cmd: Click on any column header to toggle sorting the list of instances in ascending or descending order by the selected column.
Type some search text into the Search text box to filter the list of instances.
You can filter the list of instances by selecting the filtering criteria from the filtering drop-down list boxes.
Click the Launch new instance button. The Launch Instance dialog box will appear.
Right-click the instance you want to connect to and select Connect from the context menu. The Connect to instance dialog box will appear.
Right-click the instance you want to connect to and select Reboot from the context menu. The Reboot instance dialog box will appear.
Right-click the instance you want to connect to and select Stop from the context menu. The Stop instance dialog box will appear.
Right-click the instance you want to connect to and select Terminate from the context menu. The Terminate instance dialog box will appear.

task.title: More Actions
task.shortdesc: Clicking the More actions button at the top of the Manage instances window displays a menu that contains additional actions you can perform on one or more instances.

step.cmd: Select Launch more like displays a dialog that allows you to create and customize an instance like the selected instance.
Select Get console output to display the console output from the selected instance.
Select Attach volume to attach a volume to the selected instance.
Select Detach volume to detach a volume from the selected instance.
Select Associate IP address to associate an IP address with the selected volume.
Select Disassociate IP address to disassociate an IP address from the selected volume.
